sqlMap.select: SELECT ROLE_ID, ROLE_NAME, ROLE_DESC FROM T01_SYS_ROLE P where 1=1 and ROLE_NAME like '%'||#roleName#||'%' order by ROLE_ID desc
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T01_SYS_ROLE P where 1=1 and ROLE_NAME like '%'||#roleName#||'%'
sqlMap.insert: insert into T01_SYS_ROLE (ROLE_ID, ROLE_NAME, ROLE_DESC) VALUES ('$roleId$', '$roleName$', '$roleDesc$')
sqlMap.select: SELECT a.MENU_ID ID, a.OWN_MENU_ID PID, a.MENU_NAME TEXT, a.LINK_URL URL, a.MENU_ICON ICON, case when b.menu_id is null then 'false' else 'true' end ischecked FROM T01_SYS_MENU a left join (select menu_id from T01_SYS_ROLE_MENU where role_id = '$roleId$') b on a.menu_id = b.menu_id WHERE a.MENU_ID <> 1 AND a.STATUS = 1 ORDER BY OWN_MENU_ID,MENU_SEQ
